`rustc [file]` -- to compile single file. then run executable

# Initializing cargo: 
`cargo new [project_name]`
`cd [project_name]`
## Commands for build and run: 
`cargo build` -- Compiles code
`cargo check` -- Compiles code enough to verify syntax and semantics; faster than build
`cargo run` -- builds and then runs
# Version Checking
`rustc --version`
`cargo --version`
